name: Brain game. Picture Match
description:
A game that will improve your memorization and brain power.

You must memorize a board with several pairs of disordered images.

After a short time they will cover up and you will have to find all the couples, but hurry up, time runs against you.

There are 3 time modes (No time limit, normal and hard) and 10 levels to which more difficult and 6 game modes (match 2, match 3, mirror, mirror 3, match 4 and mirror 4) each one with 10 levels making a total of 60 !!!

Picture Match, a free casual and puzzle brain trainer game for everyone.
